hooks.command: if echo "$TOOL_INPUT" | grep -q 'git push'; then current=$(gh auth status 2>&1 | grep -B2 'Active account: true' | head -1); if echo "$current" | grep -q 'ekw-erickaquino'; then gh auth switch --user erickaquino >&2; echo 'Switched to personal account (erickaquino) for push' >&2; fi; fi; exit 0
